mapper.select: select * from tb_study_recruitment order by reg_date desc

select r.study_num , r.num, r.title, r.content, r.file_group_code from tb_study_recruitment r inner join (select study_num, count(study_num) cnt from TB_PARTICIPANT group by study_num)p on r.study_num = p.study_num order by p.cnt desc
select * from tb_study_recruitment order by see_cnt desc
select str.*, s.name from tb_study_recruitment str inner join tb_study s on str.study_num = s.num where str.num = #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_study_recruitment( num, title, content, email, file_group_code, category_code, address_code, study_num ) values ( seq_study_recruitment_num.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{email}, #{fileGroupCode}, #{categoryCode}, #{addressCode}, #{studyNum} )
mapper.select: select * from tb_study_recruitment r inner join tb_file f on r.file_group_code = f.file_group_code where study_num = ${studyNum}
